Package agent

Class ActiveImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.ActiveImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveItemImp, AgentImp
    public abstract class ActiveImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Listener
    This class provides the basics of threading methods for active objects and agents in the Environment.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
